overview: Turkish Hotel: A man without a single testicle and a woman wearing an electronic anklet spend their first night on their honeymoon.  Basic Class Jisoo: The story of a woman whose goal is to learn how to float and a swimming instructor who is too lazy to teach.  I Have a Question: Two part-timers sit in the back alley during their break and chat.  I Saw a Pebble: A man waiting for a woman in front of his house meets a little kid who appears to be the woman's younger sibling.
title: Two People at the Same Town Season 1
